alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:23PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bay, southeastern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 815 PM EDT/715 PM CDT/... At 723 PM EDT/623 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach to 11 miles east of Lynn Haven. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Santa Rosa Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Ebro, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Blue Mountain Beach, West Panama City, Seaside, Bahama Beach, Brannonville, Millville and West Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington
